title: All My Expectations!
itunes:author: Guests: Bill & Vicki Rose
itunes:summary:
When you and your spouse were dating, what did you expect marriage to be like? The truth is, many of us go into a lifelong commitment with over-the-top expectations. John, Greg and Erin share examples from their own lives, and give tips for how to let go of unrealistic expectations as a newlywed. Featuring Bill and Vicki Rose.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Vicki Rose's book "Every Reason to Believe" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-08-17?refcd=1127103

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/all-my-expectations/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
